song.title: Mandaram Kathawe
song.content:
[Intro] ------------------------------- [Dm]
[Verse 1] ------------------------------- [Dm] [Am] [Dm] Numba nisa leewa kawi paaluwata [Am] [Dm] Maki yaawi enawaada heta [Bbmaj7] [C] Sina dunna eka haaduwaka [Am] Mathake yali ragena
[Chorus] ------------------------------- [Bbmaj7] [Dm] Mandaram kathawe [Bb] Sanda kinnarawe [Gm] Mage heena heena gaane inna [Csus4] [C] Enna aaye [Dm] Seyawan mawa me [Bb] Mage dasa maane [Gm] [C] Mata pena pena roo obai [Dm] [Am] [Dm] Numba nisa leewa kawi paaluwata [Am] [Dm] Maki yaawi enawaada heta
[Dm]....
[Verse 2] ------------------------------- [Dm] [Am] Dura noya inna [Dm] Thibuna numbata [Am] [Dm] Atheethe mathaka yaayatama [Bbmaj7] [C] Awith yanna niwunama hitha [Am] [Bbmaj] Hindimi un thanama
